name: Mikayla Wayne
coverLetter:
Objective: 
 
Enthusiastic person seeking an entry-level customer service/ retail position whereby hard work and dedication is rewarded with on-the-job experience and advancement. 
 
 
Qualifications: 
 
Quick learner, perceptive, enthusiastic, dependable, punctual, pleasant disposition, exceptional verbal and written communications, well organized, ability to adapt in diverse environments, patient listener, work wellindependently or unsupervised.
 
Job History:
The Hollywood Chickfila from April 2015 to March 2016. 
Pacific Park on The Santa Monica Pier From March 2016 to December 2016 
AAHS! From October 2016 to June 2017
 
Skills and Core Strengths: 
• Organized and detail-oriented   
• Able to follow directions and meet new challenges
• Good in developing interpersonal skills
• Works well with others
• Excellent communication skill
• Diligent team player
• Masters new tasks rapidly
• Exceptional  problem solving skills           
 
 
Education: 
   
High school graduate from New Millennium Secondary School.  
Some college credits at Los Angeles Southwest Community College.
